ValidationRule.description: Ensures energy levels are between 1 and 10
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Energy_Before__c)), OR(Energy_Before__c < 1, Energy_Before__c > 10)), AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Energy_After__c)), OR(Energy_After__c < 1, Energy_After__c > 10)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Energy levels must be between 1 and 10.
